cells.data:
## `DllPlugin`
creates a manifest.json file to the given path, which is used by the DllReferencePlugin to map dependencies.

contains mappings from require and import requests, to module ids

[article](https://medium.com/@soederpop/webpack-plugins-been-we-been-keepin-on-the-dll-cdfdd6cb8cd7)
[example](https://github.com/webpack/webpack/blob/master/examples/explicit-vendor-chunk/README.md)

## Speed up webpack
[speed measure plugin](https://github.com/stephencookdev/speed-measure-webpack-plugin)
